criteria_checked.criterion: Every phase created includes a detailed Goal section (minimum 2-3 sentences)
Every phase includes at least 3 success criteria that are specific and verifiable
criteria_checked.command: grep -c 'Success Criteria Generation\|3-5 success criteria\|specific and testable' src/commands/autopilot/add-phase.md

criteria_checked.criterion: Every phase includes a Depends on analysis explaining WHY
Command uses understanding to generate criteria not just parroting
criteria_checked.command: grep -c 'generate criteria\|understanding of the request\|goal-backward' src/commands/autopilot/add-phase.md

criteria_checked.criterion: Generated specs match quality of best existing phase entries

note: No rich spec generation logic exists in add-phase.md. Current implementation generates [To be planned] stubs.
